verses.verse: And if any one <WH5315> sin <WH2398>, in that he heareth <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of adjuration <WH423>, he being a witness <WH5707>, whether <WH176> he hath seen <WH7200> or known <WH3045>, if he do not utter <WH5046> it <WH5375>, then he shall bear his iniquity <WH5771>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

And if any one <WH5315> sin <WH2398>, and do <WH6213> any <WH259> of the things which Jehovah <WH3068> hath commanded <WH4687> not to be done <WH6213>; though he knew <WH3045> it not <WH816>, yet is he guilty, and shall bear <WH5375> his iniquity <WH5771>.

And he shall bring <WH935> a ram <WH352> without blemish <WH8549> out of the flock <WH6629>, according to thy estimation <WH6187>, for a trespass-offering <WH817>, unto the priest <WH3548>; and the priest <WH3548> shall make atonement <WH3722> for him concerning the thing wherein he erred <WH7683> unwittingly <WH7684> and knew <WH3045> it not <WH5545>, and he shall be forgiven.
